Detailed Description

Struct that contains all the data parsed from the options.

I know it might be skipped but it could be used for future improvements. It's easier to update a code without having to rewrite every function descriptor. bdaddr_t mac:

Field Documentation

bdaddr_t mac

MAC address chosen for the SPAM communication.

This is the 6-bytes encoding variable type defined by the Libbluetooth.
